class Foo extends React.Component {
	constructor(props) {
		super(props);
		this.state = {bar: 0};
	}
	render() {

class Foo extends Component {
	constructor() {
		this.state = {text: "foo"};
	}

	render() {
		const {state} = this;
		const {text} = state;
		return <span>{text}</span>;
	}
}
